title: How far could China’s ‘zero Covid’ protests go?
description: China has been rocked by an outpouring of communal anger at the government’s restrictive ‘zero Covid’ lockdown policies. Could the protests develop into something more substantial? Tania Branigan reports. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: How far could China’s ‘zero Covid’ protests go?
creator: The Guardian
